body:
I prepared a Go 1.4 tarball for it but even removing all the unnecessary parts (test, testdata, api, doc, blog, misc, etc), extracting it adds 2 minutes and 20 seconds (!) to the `gomote push` time:

```
ante:cmd $ gomote push linux-arm-qemu2
2015/02/26 14:49:41 installing go1.4
2015/02/26 14:52:02 Remote doesn't have "doc/progs/json5.go"
...
```
